00015 #ifndef __AES_XCBC_MAC_96_HEADER__
00016 #define __AES_XCBC_MAC_96_HEADER__
00017 
00018 #ifdef __cplusplus
00019 extern "C" {
00020 #endif
00021 
00022 #define AES_XCBC_MAC_96_RESULT_SIZE     (12) /* 96 bits */
00023 #define AES_XCBC_PRF_128_RESULT_SIZE    (AES_BLOCK_SIZE) /* 128 bits */
00024 
00025 typedef struct AES_XCBC_MAC_96_Ctx
00026 {
00027     aesCipherContext        keyAesCtx;  /* key K */
00028     aesCipherContext        aesCtx;     /* key K1, K2 or K3 */
00029     ubyte                   currBlock[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];
00030     /* bytes received -- we delay the processing until more bytes are
00031     received or final is called */
00032     ubyte                   pending[AES_BLOCK_SIZE] ;
00033     /* length of bytes received above <= AES_BLOCK_SIZE */
00034     ubyte                   pendingLen;
00035 } AES_XCBC_MAC_96_Ctx, AES_XCBC_PRF_128_Ctx;
00036

00043                                         AES_XCBC_MAC_96_Ctx* pCtx);
00044 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_XCBC_MAC_96_update(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte* data, sbyte4 dataLength,
00045                                         AES_XCBC_MAC_96_Ctx* pCtx);
00046 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_XCBC_MAC_96_final( MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte cmac[AES_XCBC_MAC_96_RESULT_SIZE],
00047                                         AES_XCBC_MAC_96_Ctx* pCtx);

00055                                         AES_XCBC_PRF_128_Ctx* pCtx);
